notes.title: Welcome to IrisNotes
notes.content:
# Welcome to IrisNotes

This is a sample note to help you get started with the application.

## Features

- **Rich Text Editing**: Use the rich editor for formatted text
- **Source Mode**: Switch to source mode for direct HTML editing
- **Storage Options**: Choose between SQLite, file system, or cloud storage
- **Themes**: Toggle between light and dark modes

## Getting Started

1. Create a new note using the + button
2. Edit this note to test the editor
3. Try switching between rich and source modes
4. Configure your storage preferences in the settings

Enjoy writing!

notes.title: Development Notes
notes.content:
# Development Configuration

This note demonstrates the local development setup.

## Local Config

- Database: `./dev/config/notes.db`
- Notes Directory: `./dev/config/notes/`
- Sample data included

## Testing

- [ ] Create new notes
- [ ] Edit existing notes
- [ ] Test storage backends
- [ ] Verify configuration changes

*This is sample data for development purposes.*
